parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number to display in the paginated query. Range: 1~10000.

parameters.name: DisposalAction
parameters.description:
Disposal action.
- **ztna_connect**: Prohibit connection to the zero-trust intranet.
- **nac_connect**: Prohibit connection to the office network access.
- **none**: No disposal action.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time for querying dynamic disposal processes. Format: Unix timestamp (in seconds).

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page in the paginated query. Range: 1~1000.

parameters.name: RecoveryType
parameters.description:
Recovery type.
- **auto**: Automatic recovery.
- **console**: Console recovery.
- **auth**: Recovery by authentication and reporting.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time for querying dynamic disposal processes. Format: Unix timestamp (in seconds).

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Disposal status. Values:
- **disposal**: In the disposal state.
- **finished**: Already automatically recovered.
- **recovery**: Recovered by authentication and reporting or console recovery.
